author: sina_mobile
title: 新疆辟谣宣传进景区 让网络清朗与美景同行_手机新浪网
text:
新疆辟谣宣传进景区 让网络清朗与美景同行
转自：中央网信办举报中心
丝路捉谣记
为进一步净化网络环境，提升群众对网络谣言的辨别能力，新疆各级网信部门积极组织开展网络辟谣主题宣传”进景区“活动，不断扩大网络辟谣宣传覆盖面，引导群众自觉抵制网络谣言，为构建安全、和谐的网络环境夯实基础。
7月14日，鄯善县委网信办联合库木塔格景区开展"丝路捉谣记之e起护景"网络辟谣宣传活动。此次活动以"给谣言按下中止键，为美景开启保护罩"为主题，通过剖析"景区围栏不让进""限时补贴"等典型案例，向游客讲解谣言识别技巧，并引导大家通过景区官方平台核实信息。活动现场，当地群众买买提积极参与"不造谣、不信谣、不传谣"举牌行动，成为"辟谣小卫士"。他感慨道："学了这些知识才明白很多传言不可信，以后旅游会更谨慎，不再被假消息骗钱了。"
喀什市委网信办开展"护景行动"网络辟谣宣传活动，助力打造丝路旅游目的地。针对游客量攀升带来的网络谣言等问题，工作人员在古城汗巴扎、铁业公社等热门区域，向游客和商户发放《网络辟谣手册》等宣传资料3000余份，并结合小红书、微博;)等平台涉喀什古城的不实攻略，以及近期疆内旅游辟谣案例，详细讲解涉旅谣言的传播特点和识别方法。网信干部们现场还演示了通过"新疆网络辟谣"平台举报不实信息的操作流程，提升景区网络负面信息的"防护力"。
和布克赛尔县委网信办创新开展"丝路捉谣记之e起护景"宣传活动，借力当地文化节火热氛围，组织网络名人共同参与。本次活动针对旅游旺季特点，将辟谣宣传融入文旅活动，让游客在游玩中提升识谣能力。活动现场，工作人员重点围绕"景区消费套路""民俗禁忌误区"等游客关切问题，通过发放宣传手册、展示案例展板等方式，用真实案例拆解谣言套路，生动讲解谣言危害，引导游客理性对待网络信息，为文旅经济发展营造清朗网络空间。
轮台县委网信办创新开展"甜蜜防线"网络辟谣行动，借力老汉瓜文化旅游节，以"瓜香飘万里，谣言止于此"为主题，将辟谣宣传与民俗体验完美融合。活动巧妙结合老汉瓜"难以外运的珍贵"特性，现场发放1000余份"防谣手册"（被游客亲切称为"另类特产"），让游客在体验"瓜田月下"民俗风情的同时，掌握辨谣技巧，这一特色宣传既为游客系牢"防谣安全带"，又为新疆旅游擦亮了"诚信金招牌"，受到群众广泛好评。
7月10日，乌什县委网信办在燕泉山景区及周边开展网络辟谣宣传活动，吸引众多游客参与。工作人员通过发放宣传手册、面对面讲解等方式，向群众普及网络谣言的危害及识别技巧。活动重点针对"景区突然关闭""强制消费"等旅游类谣言，通过典型案例分析，详细讲解谣言的传播特点和危害性，帮助游客提升识谣辨谣能力，共同维护景区良好形象。
7月14日，和田市委网信办在团城景区开展网络辟谣宣传活动，通过发放宣传单、现场讲解等方式，向游客普及网络谣言的识别与防范知识。
工作人员详细讲解了网络谣言的特征、类型及辨别方法，特别提醒游客在制定旅游攻略时，要通过官方网站核实信息，做到文明上网、理性发言。本次活动有效提升了游客的谣言防范意识，为营造良好旅游环境奠定了基础。和田市委网信办主任张明表示："我们将持续扩大宣传覆盖面，创新宣传形式，引导群众共同维护清朗网络空间。"

author: 深圳商报
title: 新能源汽车产业知识产权创新联合体揭牌
text:
【深圳商报讯】（记者 刘育銮 文灿）4月22日，坪山区2025年知识产权宣传周启动仪式上，“新能源汽车产业知识产权创新联合体”正式揭牌成立，这是全市首个知识产权领域的产业创新联合体。
　　据介绍，“新能源汽车产业知识产权创新联合体”由北京理工大学深圳汽车研究院、国家新能源汽车知识产权运营中心牵头组建。北京理工大学深圳汽车研究院是由深圳市人民政府、坪山区人民政府与北京理工大学合作共建，聚焦未来汽车“零碳、无人、多栖”三大颠覆性技术主线，贯通产业创新链条，汇聚全球创新资源，打造未来汽车原始创新高地和产业聚集高地。
　　目前，新能源汽车产业知识产权创新联合体已整合 比亚迪 （ 002594 ）、广汽、南方电网等龙头企业资源，建成17个联合实验室，形成百余项技术共享成果，同时通过整合高校、科研院所与产业链资源，初步构建专利池运营机制，推动高价值专利技术的交叉许可与共享。其目标在于突破核心技术，降低企业专利运营成本，加速科技成果转化，全面提升我国新能源汽车产业的知识产权保护能力与竞争力。
　　北京理工大学深圳汽车研究院新能源汽车知识产权运营中心负责人表示：“研究院已构建由院士领衔、20余名高层次人才为核心、百余名全职科研人员为支撑的‘雁阵式’人才梯队，并获批博士后创新实践基地和大学生实习基地，形成‘引育用留’一体化生态。联合体将以此为依托，聚焦智能网联、车路协同和车用基础工具等前沿方向，推动校企联合攻关。未来将进一步强化专利产业化机制，推动新能源汽车向环境友好、智慧出行方向升级，为产业可持续发展注入新动能。”
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business strategy and marketing

author: Juan Antonio Pascual Estapé
title: El café Biohazard es el más fuerte del mundo: cuatro veces más cafeína que un café normal | Computer Hoy
text: Hay gente que toma café porque le gusta la bebida, y otros porque la cafeína les despeja. El café Biohazard presume de potenciar lo mejor de ambos mundos. Es el café más fuerte del mundo, con cuatro veces más cafeína que el café estándar . Un café preparado por un barista tiene entre 150 y 200 miligramos de cafeína por taza. Una bebida energética, unos 750 miligramos, aunque también incluye otros estimulantes, como la taurina. Una taza de café Biohazard alcanza los 928 miligramos de cafeína . Puedes ver un vídeo en la apertura de la noticia. La Organización Mundial de la Salud (OMS) aconseja tomar un máximo de 400 miligramos de cafeína al día , unas tres tazas de café estándar. Eso significa que una sola taza de café Biohazard contiene más del doble de la cafeína que debe tomar un adulto , según la OMS. ¿Por qué se pone a la venta un café que dobla la cantidad de cafeína que se puede tomar al día? No es ilegal, al menos en Estados Unidos, porque hablamos de cantidades recomendadas, y cada uno es responsable de lo que come o bebe. Yonatan Pinhasov, cofundador y CEO de Biohazard Coffee, explica en Comunicaffe: "Queríamos un buen chute de energía para nuestras largas jornadas sin tener que sacrificar el sabor. Es un café pensado para emprendedores, padres con largas jornadas laborales, estudiantes de posgrado, personas que trabajan 18 horas al día... ¿Cómo podríamos mejorar las cosas para todos?". Efectivamente, hay personas con una vida exigente que recurren a la cafeína para mantenerse despiertos, y se toman varios cafés al día, superando las recomendaciones. Sin embargo, en las etiquetas del producto, Biohazard Coffee recomienda tomarse media taza, y pide llevar a cabo un consumo responsable . La idea que hay detrás del café más fuerte del mundo, es que con media taza o una taza, puedas aguantar toda la jornada laboral, o la sesión de estudios, y no tengas que tomar más. Es un café difícil de encontrar, ya que solo se vende en Estados Unidos . Con cuatro veces más cafeína que un café estándar, el café Biohazard no es apto para corazones sensibles . ¿Te atreverías?

author: Robin Pascoe
title: Spring fever? Thursday was the warmest February 15 on record
text: Spring fever? Thursday was the warmest February 15 on record Thursday was the warmest February 15 on record, with the temperature reaching 15.5° at the De Bilt weather station near Utrecht, where records are set. While there is no official definition of a spring day in terms of temperature, some meteorologists described Thursday as such, even though spring is officially weeks away. A summer day is defined as one in which the temperature tops 25° and a tropical day 30°. “We have broken a lot more heat records than cold records in the past few years,” NOS weatherman Marco Verhoef told the broadcaster. “But that is part of the trend towards a warmer climate.” The warmest February 16 record is safe on Friday, Verhoef said. “We are not going to reach 16.7°,” he said. The coming days will remain warm for the time of year but will not be as extreme as Thursday, he said. According to the KNMI weather bureau, the temperature will remain between 10° and 12° until Thursday at least. There will be some sun on Saturday but showers as well, while Sunday will be wet for much of the day. The rest of the week will be overcast with showers and that is likely to continue towards March. Thank you for donating to DutchNews.nl. We could not provide the Dutch News service, and keep it free of charge, without the generous support of our readers. Your donations allow us to report on issues you tell us matter, and provide you with a summary of the most important Dutch news each day. [Make a donation](/donate-to-dutchnews-nl)

author: @gurufocus
title: Pfizer Advances Bold Vision for Future of Cancer Care at the ASCO 2025 Annual Meeting | PFE ...
text:
- Pfizer (
PFE,Financial) to present over 60 abstracts at ASCO 2025, showcasing advancements in oncology. - Key studies include the BREAKWATER trial for colorectal cancer and VERITAC-2 study for breast cancer.
- Focus on achieving eight breakthrough cancer medicines by 2030 with nine new pivotal Phase 3 trials in 2025.
Pfizer Inc. (PFE) is set to highlight their extensive oncology portfolio with more than 60 abstracts at the 2025 American Society of Clinical Oncology (ASCO) Annual Meeting from May 30 to June 3 in Chicago. The presentations will cover various cancer types, including breast, genitourinary, hematologic, and thoracic cancers, as well as advancements in colorectal cancer treatments.
Significant presentations will include the Phase 3 BREAKWATER study on BRAFTOVI® (encorafenib) combined with cetuximab and mFOLFOX6 in BRAF V600E-mutant metastatic colorectal cancer. This study will showcase detailed analyses of overall survival and progression-free survival, providing important insights following its FDA accelerated approval in late 2024.
In breast cancer, the Phase 3 VERITAC-2 study will present data on vepdegestrant, a PROTAC ER degrader, in ER+/HER2- advanced or metastatic breast cancer. This study aims to support the continued development of vepdegestrant in collaboration with Arvinas.
Pfizer will also showcase five-year survival data from the Phase 3 ARCHES study of XTANDI® (enzalutamide) in combination with androgen deprivation therapy in metastatic hormone-sensitive prostate cancer. Additionally, the MagnetisMM-6 study will present initial results for ELREXFIO® (elranatamab) in combination with daratumumab and lenalidomide for patients with newly diagnosed multiple myeloma.
Furthermore, Pfizer continues to explore novel vedotin antibody-drug conjugates (ADCs) in combination with immune checkpoint inhibitors, with initial Phase 1 data being presented for new ADCs in thoracic cancers.
This year, Pfizer is advancing up to nine new pivotal Phase 3 trials, with a strategic goal of delivering eight breakthrough cancer medicines by 2030. The company's presentations at ASCO 2025 underline its commitment to enhancing cancer care through innovative therapies and collaborative efforts.

author: Michael Knowles
title: Keir Starmer's asylum plan would plunge UK immigration system into 'a new depth of chaos' | Politics | News | Express.co.uk
text:
Migrants crossing the English Channel (Image: Getty) Keir Starmer's asylum plans would "plunge our immigration system into a new depth of chaos", a leading think tank has warned.
Labour sources have floated the idea of allowing refugees to claim asylum at UK embassies across the world.
But Migration Watch warned the "absurd" idea would be unaffordable, harm diplomatic relations and "undermine border control even more greatly".
Those refused asylum could then attempt to cross the Channel on a small boat, the think tank said.
Migrants crossing the English Channel (Image: Getty) Trending Alp Mehmet, Chairman of Migration Watch UK, said: “The asylum scheme is already in chaos. The government should drop their scheme for an annual cap which would be a prime target for the asylum lobby.
“The public are seriously, and rightly concerned about the huge strains imposed on public services, communities and especially housing.
“Over the last two years immigration and asylum have added the population of Birmingham to the UK population. The public have already had enough. Now is the time for sensible caution.
“Meanwhile Labour’s scheme to allow asylum claimants to make applications at UK embassies in Europe would plunge our immigration asylum system into a new depth of chaos.”
Outlining why they believe the plan would be so chaotic, the think-tank said: “Labour’s absurd scheme to open up UK embassies abroad to asylum claims poses an even greater threat to the integrity of the system and would undermine border control even more gravely.
“This is because any UK office overseas that was charged with considering applications would likely be flooded with them.
“Indeed, it is likely that foreign governments would refuse to agree to their establishment lest those who failed should remain on their territory.
“Furthermore, those declined at an overseas British office might well move on to France and try their luck crossing the Channel.
“The cost of opening and manning offices overseas would be much better spent helping far more people in greater difficulty.”
However, ministers were also warned plans for an annual cap on the number of refugees allowed to settle in the UK must be scrapped.
The limit – set to be agreed by Parliament from 2025 - would not include those arriving under existing emergency schemes set up in response to the Ukraine war, the Taliban takeover of Afghanistan or the crisis in Hong Kong.
The authors said this would lead to the UK taking more refugees “year-on-year”, costing taxpayers billions of pounds more than the £4bn already being spent.
Migration Watch also warned plans to expand the number of safe and legal routes to the UK would exacerbate pressure on the asylum system.

author: @TheGlobalHerald
title: Skunk water sprayed at worshippers near Al-Aqsa Mosque - The Global Herald
text: Al Jazeera English published this video item, entitled “Skunk water sprayed at worshippers near Al-Aqsa Mosque” – below is their description. There has been a skunk water truck which has been spraying water towards Palestinians and Muslim worshippers. This produces an awful smell, which has been drifting in the air. People have also been attacked with tear gas grenades. The reason why there are these confrontations is that, since October 7, there have been vast restrictions on Muslims entering the place they revere as the third holiest place in Islam, the Al-Aqsa Mosque compound. The Israelis are only allowing people over 45 years old, but even then, they can restrict them. We have only seen about 3,00 to 4,000 worshippers in the past two weeks. Usually, you’d have between 50,000 and 60,000 people praying in the mosque. So there’s been real tension here.Al Jazeera English YouTube Channel Got a comment? Leave your thoughts in the comments section, below. Please note comments are moderated before publication.
